post_message: The Garland Police Department is asking those people who are able to remain safely sheltered in their homes to do so.  Residents who leave the damaged area will not be allowed to return until it is deemed safe.  Officials are working to identify and secure any possible utility hazards such as gas leaks and downed power lines.
